Program solution: The vectors w = (x, y) with (1, 2)· w = x + 2y = 5 lie on a line in the xy plane. The shortest w on that line is (1, 2). (The Schwarz inequality kwk ≥ v · w/kvk = √5 is an equality when cos θ = 0 and w = (1, 2) and kwk =√5.)
